TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AppSettingsExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 按照声明性表达式指定的设置，从 Web.config 文件的 节中检索值。

span.span: Retrieves values, as specified in a declarative expression, from the section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供对 web.config 文件的 `` 部分中的值的访问。The class provides access to values in the `` section of the Web.config file. Web.config 文件的 `` 节包含键/值对中特定于应用程序的值。The `` section of the Web.config file contains application-specific values in key/value pairs. 通过分配窗体的表达式来检索应用程序值An application value is retrieved by assigning an expression of the form `<%$ AppSettings: appSettingsKey %>` 控件声明中的属性。to a property in a control declaration. 冒号前面的表达式部分（:)指定要检索的表达式的类型，冒号后面的部分表示密钥。The part of the expression before the colon (:) designates the type of expression to be retrieved, and the part after the colon signifies the key. 前面的表达式将从 web.config 文件中检索以下值。The preceding expression would retrieve the following value from the Web.config file. `` `` `` 当页分析器遇到带有 `AppSettings` 前缀的表达式时，它将创建一个 类的实例以处理该表达式。When the page parser encounters an expression with the `AppSettings` prefix, it creates an instance of the class to handle the expression. 如果在要编译的页面中遇到表达式，则 对象将生成代码以从 web.config 文件中检索指定的值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will be compiled, the object generates code to retrieve the specified value from the Web.config file. 此代码在生成的页类执行期间执行。This code is executed during the execution of the generated page class. 如果在不进行编译的页面中遇到表达式，则在分析和执行该页时， 对象将从 web.config 文件返回值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will not be compiled, the object returns the value from the Web.config file when the page is parsed and executed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在未编译的页中检索应用程序设置值。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve an application settings value in a page that is not compiled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 此代码从 web.config 文件中检索以下表达式。This code retrieves the following expression from the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在无编译页中遇到形式 `<%$ AppSettings: someApplicationSetting %>` 的表达式时，将调用此方法。This method is called when an expression of the form `<%$ AppSettings: someApplicationSetting %>` is encountered in a no-compile page. 它从 web.config 文件的 `` 部分中的键/值对中检索相应的值。It retrieves the appropriate value from the key/value pairs in the `` section of the Web.config file. 此方法重写 ，方法是将 属性的 方法作为 `key` 参数、 属性上的 属性作为 `propertyName` 参数，并将 参数的 `target` 作为 `targetType` 参数。This method overrides by calling the method with the property as the `key` parameter, the property on the property as the `propertyName` parameter, and the of the `target` parameter as the `targetType` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法从 web.config 文件的 `` 节中的键/值对中检索相应的值。This method retrieves the appropriate value from the key/value pairs in the `` section of the Web.config file. 它通过获取带有键作为索引的 属性来检索值。It retrieves the value by getting the property with the key as the index. 返回的 的类型 。The returned is of the type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法从 web.config 文件的 `` 节中的键/值对中检索相应的值。This method retrieves the appropriate value from the key/value pairs in the `` section of the Web.config file. 通过获取带有键作为索引的 属性来检索值。The value is retrieved by getting the property with the key as the index. 生成的字符串值将根据 `targetType` 和 `propertyName` 参数转换为新类型。The resulting string value is converted to a new type based on the `targetType` and `propertyName` parameters.

exception.span: 在 Web.config 中未找到该键。

span.span: The key is not found in Web.config.
-or-
The return value could not be converted.

summary.span: 返回一个代码表达式，该表达式用于在生成的页类中为属性赋值。

span.span: Returns a code expression that is used to perform the property assignment in the generated page class.
A that is used in the property assignment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在创建页面或控件的 CodeDOM 过程中调用。This method is called during the CodeDOM creation for a page or control. 返回 对象表示要添加到生成的页类中的属性分配的代码表达式。The returned object represents the code expression to add to the property assignment in the generated page class.

.property instance bool SupportsEvaluate
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsEvaluate As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsEvaluate { bool get(); };
member this.SupportsEvaluate : bool

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示是否可在不编译的页中计算表达式。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否已在类中实现 方法，并可返回表达式的值。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class and can return a value for the expression. 若要在未编译的页中计算表达式，必须在表达式生成器内实现 。 must be implemented within an expression builder for an expression to be evaluated in a page that is not compiled. 类支持在未编译的页中计算应用程序设置，因此它始终返回 `true`。The class supports evaluation of an application setting in a page that is not compiled, so it always returns `true`.

span.span: ASP.NET Expressions Overview
